title: Organic Valley Welcomes Jeff Frank As New Chief Executive Officer - PR Newswire
summary: Organic Valley announces Jeff Frank as its new CEO, recognizing his expertise and leadership skills in the food industry and expressing optimism for the cooperative's future under his guidance.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is a green innovation as it involves the appointment of a CEO who is committed to guiding organic food and farming in an environmentally sustainable way.
business_innovation: TRUE. This is a business innovation as it introduces a new Chief Executive Officer, Jeff Frank, to lead Organic Valley, bringing his experience and skills from Hormel Foods.
green_product: TRUE. This article discusses Organic Valley's commitment to producing ethically sourced organic food from small family farms, demonstrating their focus on environmental sustainability and human health benefits.
green_process: FALSE. While the article mentions commitment to environmental stewardship and sustainability, it does not specify any particular method or technique in manufacturing or production that minimizes environmental impacts.

title: Serenity Kids Reinvents Smoothies with the Launch of the First Ever Low Sugar, Dairy-Free Smoothies with Grass Fed ... - PR Newswire

green_innovation: FALSE. The article discusses a new product launch in the baby and toddler food category, focusing on nutrient-rich dairy-free smoothies; while the product may offer health benefits, it does not specifically highlight environmental sustainability goals or contributions.

green_product: TRUE. The introduction of Serenity Kids' new Dairy-Free Smoothie pouches aligns with the definition of green products by incorporating organic vegetables, low sugar content, protein from grass-fed collagen, and aiming to provide a nutrient-rich, environmentally friendly option for young children.

green_product: FALSE, The article does not focus on specific products but on strategic plans and initiatives within the Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET), hence not discussing green products directly.
